findings.details: Added explicit aria-labels to newsletter forms for clearer screen reader context.
Manual scan found no placeholder/example.com links in posts/pages. External URLs not live-checked due to offline audit.
Front matter descriptions/keywords present on primary pages; SEO tag remains enabled.
Recent updates keep blog and newsletter UX consistent; no stale placeholder content detected.

recommendations: Keep auditing external URLs with an online checker when network access is available.
Continue aligning form labels and ARIA annotations across new sections.
